meanings.definition: The position or duties of a guardian.
meanings.sent1: Her guardianship of the children was a big responsibility.
meanings.sent2: The court granted her guardianship over her younger siblings.
meanings.sent3: Taking on the guardianship of a mischievous puppy was quite the adventure.
meanings.sent4: In the forest of life, she stood as the sturdy guardianship of her family.
meanings.sent5: The guardianship of the ancient artifact was entrusted to the wise elder.

meanings.definition: The state of being under the protection of a guardian.
meanings.sent1: The orphan found comfort in his new guardianship.
meanings.sent2: The princess lived under the guardianship of the royal knight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten enjoyed the guardianship of the vigilant dog.
meanings.sent4: Under the guardianship of the wise owl, the forest creatures felt safe.
meanings.sent5: The guardianship of the castle was entrusted to the loyal knight.
